resume.about:
French IT student, I am completing my computer sciences Master’s degree. I am looking for a 6 month internship in web development for February 2023 with the possibility to get a full-time job offer afterward.
I am hard-working and diligent in order to always improve myself and learn new concepts and skills.
In my opinion, gaining experience,overcoming obstacles and comparing multiple ideas are the keys to reach these goals.
